name: MoonBase Arcana
description:
#IWantToCreate

You've crash landed your spiffy spaceship on a magic moon and, must craft crazy cyborgs to battle greedy goblins and mine magical moon gems, all in a bid to fix your broken ship before the universe comes crashing to a catastrophic end!

  • Randomly Generated World
  • Mine for Gems to Rebuild Your Vessel
  • Explore Dungeons for Magical Loot
  • Craft Various Robots (In Progress)
  • Minimap with Fog of War
  • Keybinding and Joystick Support

Credits

Programming: AlmightyZenTaco, Sumo148, VJ_Browning

Art Design: MonkeyFox
